name: mpl-token-auth-rules-workspace
description: Workspace for MPL Token Authorization Rules.  MPL Token Authorization Rules can be used to restrict common token operations
author: Metaplex Maintainers <contact@metaplex.com>

scripts.build: yarn build:rust && yarn solita && yarn fix:format && yarn build:sdk && yarn build:docs
scripts.fix:format: (cd program; cargo fmt) && yarn workspace @miraplex/miraplex-token-auth-rules fix:prettier
scripts.lint: (cd program; cargo clippy) && yarn workspace @miraplex/miraplex-token-auth-rules lint
